doc:
Paul E. Burns https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_E._Burns 0 Paul E. Burns (January 26, 1881 – May 17, 1967) was an American actor, born Paul Edward Burns in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, had a very lengthy career on film and television, although mostly in bit parts. He played Ebenezer Hawkins in Son of Paleface (1952), Latitude Bucket in The Royal Mounted Rides Again (1945), and Jim the Caretaker in The Mummy's Tomb (1942). Paul_E._Burns ( January_26_,_1881 – May_17_,_1967 ) was an_American_actor , born Paul_Edward_Burns in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania , had a_very_lengthy_career on film_and_television , although mostly in bit_parts . He played Ebenezer_Hawkins in Son of Paleface_(_1952_) , Latitude_Bucket in The_Royal Mounted Rides_Again_(_1945_) , and Jim the_Caretaker in The_Mummy 's_Tomb_(_1942_) .
